info.author: Ozgur Gunes
info.description:
========
Adworks
========

A simple Django application to manage ad banner design and approval processes.


Requirements
============

* Python 2.7+
* Django 1.4+

Installation
============

Install using pip: ::

    $ pip install django-adworks
    
Or install from source code: ::

    $ python setup.py install

Usage
=====

Add ``adworks`` to your ``INSTALLED_APPS`` ::

    INSTALLED_APPS = (
        ...
        'adworks',
    )
    
Include ``adworks`` in your ``urls.py`` ::

    url('adworks', include('adworks.urls')),
    
Create necessary database tables ::

    $ python manage.py syncdb
    
or ::

    $ python manage.py migrate adworks
info.name: django-adworks
info.summary: A simple Django application to manage ad banner design and approval processes.
info.html_description:
A simple Django application to manage ad banner design and approval processes.

Requirements

  • Python 2.7+
  • Django 1.4+

Installation

Install using pip:

$ pip install django-adworks

Or install from source code:

$ python setup.py install

Usage

Add adworks to your INSTALLED_APPS

INSTALLED_APPS = (
    ...
    'adworks',
)

Include adworks in your urls.py

url('adworks', include('adworks.urls')),

Create necessary database tables

$ python manage.py syncdb

or

$ python manage.py migrate adworks
